title: Application of Multimedia Learning Neurological Mechanisms and Design Principles

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in cognitive science and neuroscience, and multimedia learning experience
context.additional_context: Analyzing cognitive processing efficiency according to multimedia design principles in a smartphone-based learning environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain the impact of multimedia design principles (five principles) on brain neural networks.
Learners can apply methods to compare local/global information processing efficiency through EEG data analysis.
Learners can evaluate integration/separation characteristics of non-principled design cases through modular organization analysis.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
